Mon idée n'est pas simplement de créer u: My idea is not simply create yet another tattooist directory without much added value, but to build a complete service for all the tattoo market actors :
Guider les futurs tatoués dans leur quêt: Guide tattoo enthusiasts in their quest of the holy Grall!
Apporter des outils pour simplifier la p: Bring a tool kit to simplify the non artistic part of your activity.
Centraliser dans une même plateforme les: Centralise in the same platform all needed tools to manage a parlor for managers.
Fort de 12 ans dans le web et mordu de t: After 12 years building web services and tattoo fan, I decided to combine these 2 passions at the service of artists.
La multiplication des réseaux sociaux pe: Social networks multiplication don't help enough people to find the right information or to get in touch with artists. Receiving requests on multiple places can easily be a mess!
Toujours en quête de savoir et de découv: Always in search of knowledge and new expericences, do not hesitate to share your expertise with me so that we build the best tool for you.
